医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
当归提取物成为血管疾病的潜在治疗方法一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 23 期，题为“Angelica gigas extract Prevents acetate of eNOS via IRE1α磺化/RIDD-SIRT1介导的血管功能障碍的翻译后修饰。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Angelica-gigas-extract-emerges-as-a-pottial-treatment-for-angio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Angelica-gigas-extract-emerges-as-a-pottial-treatment-for-angio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96234933-b166-4e78-8a91-1094380b9ff7 Thu, 28 Dec 2023 21:07:11 -0500 Angelica gigas extract emerges as a potential treatment for vascular disease
更好地诊断和治疗缺血性胆囊炎的新见解缺血性胆囊炎是一种胆囊炎症，在没有胆结石或其他形式的外部压迫的情况下发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/New-insights-on-better-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-ischemic-cholecystitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/New-insights-on-better-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-ischemic-cholecystitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a6b159a-2be0-40c4-8287-55d187b1590b Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:59:14 -0500 New insights on better diagnosis and treatment of ischemic cholecystitis
人工智能的进步可能会彻底改变肝细胞癌的诊断肝细胞癌（HCC）是最常见的肝癌类型。这是一个主要的全球健康问题，发病率不断上升，特别是在北非和东亚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/AI-advances-could-revolutionize-hepatocellular-carcinoma-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/AI-advances-could-revolutionize-hepatocellular-carcinoma-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a2e8f97-3fd9-4a5a-bbdc-d4b8388cf87b Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:49:37 -0500 AI advances could revolutionize hepatocellular carcinoma diagnosis
Insilico Medicine 开发新的 AI 生成的 FGFR2/3 抑制剂，用于治疗组织不可知的实体瘤Insilico Medicine（“Insilico”）是一家生成人工智能（AI）驱动的临床阶段药物发现公司，今天宣布提名 ISM8001，这是一种靶向 FGFR2/3 的新型分子，用于治疗与组织无关的实体瘤2023 年提名的 PCC 数量达到 6 个。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Insilico-Medicine-develops-new-AI- generated-FGFR23-inhibitor-for-tissue-agnostic-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Insilico-Medicine-develops-new-AI- generated-FGFR23-inhibitor-for-tissue-agnostic-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a2d7e70-518f-4ee4-932c-bc6e6864bc58 Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:33:43 -0500 Insilico Medicine develops new AI-generated FGFR2/3 inhibitor for tissue-agnostic solid tumors
Lisocabtagene maraleucel：复发/难治性 DLBCL 的经济有效的二线治疗根据今天发表的一项研究，Lisocabtagene maraleucel (liso-cel) 是一种 CAR T 细胞疗法，是一种具有成本效益的二线治疗复发性难治性（难以治疗）弥漫性大 B 细胞淋巴瘤 (r/r DLBCL)在血液进展中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Lisocabtagene-maraleucel-A-cost-efficient-second-line-treatment-for-relapsedrefractory-DLBCL.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Lisocabtagene-maraleucel-A-cost-efficient-second-line-treatment-for-relapsedrefractory-DLBCL.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=367e17db-6ae6-4a82-a31d-185541bdd4ad Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:07:01 -0500 Lisocabtagene maraleucel: A cost-effective second-line treatment for relapsed/refractory DLBCL
研究发现，综合护理可能不是心理健康治疗的灵丹妙药美国的医疗保健系统已逐渐接受这样的概念，即心理健康应与身体健康同等对待，特别是考虑到在 COVID-19 大流行期间和之后焦虑和抑郁的发生率增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Integrated-care-may-not-be-the-silver-bullet-for-mental-health-treatment-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Integrated-care-may-not-be-the-silver-bullet-for-mental-health-treatment-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6179aee6-0404-4fe1-9f64-e18f51dcb662 Thu, 28 Dec 2023 20:01:20 -0500 Integrated care may not be the silver bullet for mental health treatment, study finds
下一代测序发现数千名癌症患者错过了免疫治疗布里格姆研究人员的下一代测序结果表明，修订当前的癌症护理指南可以让美国每年大约有 6,000 名患者从免疫疗法中受益https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Next-gen-sequencing-identizes-thousands-of-cancer-病人-missing-out-on-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Next-gen-sequencing-identizes-thousands-of-cancer-患者-missing-out-on-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b435362-bfa9-42e9-a1cf-b0ad94bdca1c Thu, 28 Dec 2023 19:45:00 -0500 Next-gen sequencing identifies thousands of cancer patients missing out on immunotherapy
新型非甾体抗炎药可以抑制细胞因子风暴并保持先天免疫在 COVID-19 大流行的早期，对住院的 COVID-19 患者进行的临床试验证实，地塞米松等皮质类固醇可降低死亡率，但在首次出现 COVID-19 症状时使用它们是有害的，因为先天抗病毒免疫力会减弱，从而导致病毒清除延迟和严重病毒性肺炎的不良后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/New-non-steroidal-anti-lingual-can-inhibit-the-cytokine-storm-and-preserve-innate-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/New-non-steroidal-anti-lingual-can-inhibit-the-cytokine-storm-and-preserve-innate-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edbfdf60-17da-49cf-b534-deaad313a255 Thu, 28 Dec 2023 19:34:48 -0500 New non-steroidal anti-inflammatory can inhibit the cytokine storm and preserve innate immunity
镉与颗粒物引起的 DNA 损伤和形态变化有关颗粒物会给吸入细小液滴和颗粒的人带来健康问题，但混合物的化学成分很重要，并且在空间和时间上可能存在很大差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Cadmium-linked-to-DNA-damage-and-morphological-changes-caused-by-pativity-matter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Cadmium-linked-to-DNA-damage-and-morphological-changes-caused-by-pativity-matter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b7dd040-8f31-4247-8d10-e966d629b692 Thu, 28 Dec 2023 19:27:35 -0500 Cadmium linked to DNA damage and morphological changes caused by particulate matter
研究发现脓毒症大大降低了重返工作岗位的机会几年前，世界卫生组织估计，世界上五分之一的死亡病例与血液中毒或败血症有关。每年有 1100 万人死于败血症，其中近 300 万人是儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Sepsis-greatly-reduces-the-chances-of-returning-to-work-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231228/Sepsis-greatly-reduces-the-chances-of-returning-to-work-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f002f1ab-625c-424c-916b-66f838cd8bae Thu, 28 Dec 2023 13:39:23 -0500 Sepsis greatly reduces the chances of returning to work, study finds
